com.android.extendedWidgets

Class TouchCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.android.extendedWidgets.TouchCircle

  • public class TouchCircle
extends View
    Personalized controller based on a circle and angles that form between each other each user's fingers when handling multi-touch screen.
    Author:
    tomasz
